text:
Pearson MyLab Statistics is integrated with our Blackboard Ultra course. To access:

1. Open the MyLab/Pearson link inside our Blackboard Ultra course.
2. Sign into your Pearson account (or create one if you donâ€™t have one).
3. When prompted, enter an access code or choose a payment option (select the best option for you).
4. After linking, all course materials will be automatically associated with your account access from Blackboard.

Note: Use your UAA name and email to ensure grades and access link properly.
